website_summaries.verdict: This green laser sight fits on most pistols, rifles, and shotguns. It also comes packed with features like an ambidextrous switch and 3 operating modes.
pros: Laser is very bright and easy to see
Constant on, momentary, and strobe modes
Included battery has a 2-hour battery life
cons: The mount here is plastic, and some buyers say it either arrives broken or breaks fairly quickly
Reports of problems getting it to stay zeroed in

customer_reviews.title: The GREEN is MEAN!
customer_reviews.text: The green is MEAN! I put this on my Springfield XD Mod. 2 9mm Subcompact and it fits perfectly. This is my new CC firearm/laser of choice. Out of the box the zero is very good. A half dozen shots at the range later and the zero was perfect. I also recommend green over red. It is much brighter and visible on a well lit range at 25 yds.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Dis satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item cause im a big fan of crimson trace ive got three on other guns and ive had them for several years I got this same one on and AK 47 pistol and it works fine ive not used it as much as the one on my Glock 20 in 10 mm but it will not come on the first time I press the on button but I have to press it twice every time I want it to come on I like it but disappointed in the problem im having
customer_reviews.author: randy h.

customer_reviews.title: Not for self defense weapons.
customer_reviews.text: Never trust this laser on a self defense weapon. Took it to the range and the recoil caused the battery cover to come off disabling the laser. Called Crimson Trace and they sent me 3 replacement covers. I figured maybe the first one was defective. I went back to the range and again the cover came off during recoil. I am glad I learned this lesson at the range and not when my life depended on in. I will be going back to just using factory sights on my carry weapons. Something I know I can trust my life with.
customer_reviews.author: 2-Tone

customer_reviews.title: Good sight, but beware of the battery for life program
customer_reviews.text: The system works well. It holds zero and can be removed from the gun. It is a very expensive sight so being able to move it gun to gun is important. The battery for life program has changed. They have changed the required information now requiring serial numbers, etc for each battery request. It is obvious they don't want to honor the promise and are trying to make it hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and fit my M&P perfectly. The terminology on the target adjustment is a bit confusing (seemed to be opposite of a scope) but didn't take long to figure it out so not a big deal. Looks great on my pistol and is dead accurate. I did take the advice from one review where he put a drop of lock tight on the threads of the mounting screws but not because I had any trouble..... just seemed like a good tip that couldn't hurt. Green laser is very easy to see in the daylight as well. Glad that I made this purchase over some cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Green Laser!
customer_reviews.text: This laser attachment is super bright, which I like. It can be seen in total daylight, and definitely at night. It's so bright that it actually illuminates a room when the laser hits the wall, especially if it's white. PROS: Easy to install. Simple to zero. Bright laser. Sleek design/profile. CONS: It starts to lose it's zero after a few dozen shots. As well, the battery compartment tends to slide open/come loose after awhile. I would buy new version if the issues I mentioned above is addressed.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: number one laser light on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Smith & Wesson M&P Shield 2.0 easy. After tuning it in it works great and overcomes the Factory sights being set off enough that you always Shoot To the Left. The laser actor tuned in now hits accurately deadcenter every shot. I like this better than rechargeable ones because when I take the weapon out to use it the light always works. Also like the fact a free batteries for life. Anybody looking for a laser light should spend the extra money and buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: ooze

customer_reviews.title: Broken right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This review does not reflect any negative about the seller but the product produced by Crimson. When i received the CMR-206 laser i noticed while trying to attach it to the handgun rail, one side of the laser rail mount was broken off. Found the broken piece inside the pouch where the laser was. Disappointing to say the least. Sent it back. Not sure i i trust this rail mount design from Crimson if it can break that easy, how well will it hold up on a handgun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beretta's best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Beretta 92s, used reportedly from Italian police. Gun was/is in excellent shape, obviously infrequently fired. But the sights are poor to useless; future iterations of the 92 series have improved on the sights. But for the 92s, this is the ONLY way to improve accuracy of sighting. And it really, really does help! Not cheap, but excellent. Yes, depending on the actual gun one has, the laser may be 'off' somewhat, and, with no adjustability, that is what one has to live with. But, once adjusted to the inaccuracy, if present for your gun, it still provides infinitely better results -- just adjust your aim accordingly. A definite winner for this older version of a great gun.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for a product you might bet your life on.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. Received it, installed it. Put the battery in it and it didn’t work found a new battery still didn’t work. Crimson trace has really gone downhill. Okay so replacement for the defective one arrived. I installed it and it works. Testing it out today at range but doggone CT? I have about 6 more of your products and really your quality is getting bad vs the price. Get it together as free batteries do not make up for bad products.
customer_reviews.author: BlackDogTX

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have...Period
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and mounted this to my recently acquired Springfield XD9. Finally had the opportunity to shoot when range opened. Since my XD9 arrived already dialed in all I had to do was turn the laser on, look down my sites and make a very slight horizontal adjustment. I literally punched out the 4" inner circle on my target at the range the first day. This laser, when dialed in takes all the guess-work out of play.
customer_reviews.author: UncleMarko

customer_reviews.title: not holding zero
customer_reviews.text: took it out of the box and installed, sight in and shot 100 rounds sight not holding zero. checked no movement on the gun, sight in again shot 50 round not holding zero. send an email to costumer services never got an answer. tried to call no answer. save your money and buy better quality.
customer_reviews.author: shay hetz

customer_reviews.title: Crimson Trace CMR-206
customer_reviews.text: I have a Taurus PT111 G2 and was unsure which laser would work best for me. After receiving and installing it on my piston, I could not be happier. I realize the value of a laser and have showed a friend that has some physical/health issues and he will order one also. You can not over-look the value a laser offers to you when it allows you the ability of shooting it when you do not have time to bring the pistol up in a so-call sighting possition. Wished I had one for my Ruger LC9. The green laser light is brighter than I thought it would be. Again, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: No issues.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this based on the broken reviews. I put this on a 92FS and it works fine. Nothing cracked, nothing broke. After installation, drop-tested on the grass/dirt from about 3 feet. Nothing cracked, nothing broke. Guessing folks are tightening too tight, or don't have good placement on the rail, causing them to have poor results. Recommend taking your time, read the instructions, and go for a snug fit. Think tightening your engine oil filter. If you have someone else change your oil, have someone else put this on your gun.
customer_reviews.author: robk64

customer_reviews.title: Real strong.
customer_reviews.text: If you've only used red laser welcome to the new world. In a dark room/area, reflected light from the dot will practically light up the place. I don't need tactical lights with this in my place. Does what red laser can't. Bathes closed area in dim green light, brighter and more visible than red. Same great Crimson Trace build quality (they might want to consider a name change, maybe "green arrow"). Got product as ordered, on time, undamaged. No snags with this supplier. Would recommend to friend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Racz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laser sight.
customer_reviews.text: What else can you expect from Crimson Trace. Very bright, very easy to mount, easy to activate. One problem I found was that it does not come with complete instructions. It took me a while to figure out how to get the laser to go into "flash" or "momentary " mode. To activate either of these modes you need to hold the on and off switch down for a while, the green laser will flash once and it will go into strobe mode. Then to go to momentary mode, you must do the same thing, hold the activation switch on for a few seconds again. Otherwise I give it 5 + stars.
customer_reviews.author: John Wildeman

customer_reviews.title: Superb accessory for any pistol equipped with an accessory rail.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this laser on my CZ 75B SP-01 9mm pistol and it has been a superb accessory. The green laser is nice and bright, and this device will allow me to shoot tight groups comparable to using the very accurate iron sights that the gun comes equipped with. The laser would be very effective in a home defense scenario, and is a hoot to shoot with at the range. It is simple and easy to mount this laser on your pistol's accessory rail. It is easy to change the battery and doing so does not disturb your zero settings. I am very pleased with this accessory. RJB.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J. BuffingtonTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: On my AR SBR?
customer_reviews.text: And that's exactly where it is. Attached to .300 blackout SBR( thanks to $200 tax stamp), and after roughly 700 rounds, have had not one issue with recoil affecting it's position, accuracy or mounting. Have had not one issue at all. Read an article that said this laser works on the AR platform. Thought it was a bit odd, but convinced myself to try it. Am I glad I did. Placed on lower rail by muzzle, the controls are worked effortlessly by both thumb and/or index finger. Practically unnoticeable sitting beside my InForce WML light. Actually looks like it belongs on the rifle. I do highly recommend this unit if you are considering putting this on your AR style rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jay

customer_reviews.title: 500 rounds and no problems
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. CT may want to think about selling separate attachments for different pistols. Generic attachment work for all pistols, but you get "good" and not "excellent" set up. I would not mind buying the Sight without rail attach assembly, then paying separately for assembly specific for my pistol. But generic works so no deduction. Have almost 500 rounds with it on a 9MM and have not had to re-site. Green is easy to see to ~25ft - did not try it any further than that.
customer_reviews.author: Mystwalker

customer_reviews.title: Can be seen at up to 100 ft. in broad daylight!!
customer_reviews.text: This laser is amazing. I had a little trouble getting it sighted in but once I did I am ecstatic with it. Unlike the red laser that I used before this green one can be seen in broad daylight & up to 100 feet!! I'll never own anything but a green laser again. Crimson Trace, you have provided me with a greater sense of security! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy M.

customer_reviews.title: Put some tape over the battery door.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a competition shooter. I (used to) run this laser on my rifle until the batter door broke loose during a match, launching the battery door off into the great unknown. I figured it wouldn't be a big deal, sure my match was affected but I can reach out to crimson trace and purchase a replacement. Lo and Behold I've reached out and never got a response. Aesthetics: B (too much plastic) Mounting system: D+ (flathead screws instead of torx??) The laser itself: A Battery door retainment: F Customer Service: F Will not be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Customer service? Good luck
customer_reviews.text: On first trip to the range the small metal battery cover flew off, ending up God knows where. I figured no problem, I'll just contact crimson trace to get a new one, no biggie. Call their 800 number, which states they're focusing on emails only. Send emails to two different CT emails. No response. First email was one month ago. Contact us page (twice) ... no response. Facebook response : wait for email response. Meanwhile this item is unusable for over a month now. So beware, if you need service GOOD LUCK! This was my first and likely last CT purchase, customer service is bottom of the barrel.
customer_reviews.author: M. Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright and Compact
customer_reviews.text: This laser is very compact and easy to install on a Glock 19. The green laser is extremely bright and easy to see even in daylight. It does not hold zero very well but that is due to the mounting system I believe. You can flex it slightly with your finger when turning it on. But the deviation has only been 1/2” - 1” at 7 yards which is well within my personal tolerance for self defense. So you can still hit your target within this range, but if you’re using it for longer distances it may not work as well you like. Overall I like it and will most likely get another.
customer_reviews.author: Greg E

customer_reviews.title: was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: What a quality piece of engineering. Fit my Glock 19 perfectly, was easy to install, and looks great on the gun. Green laser is BRIGHT and well defined. Three year warranty and one free battery per year for life. The price from ABCD Sales in Norman OK was a killer bargain and arrived 3 days early. If looking for a great CRC laser sight check out ABCD Sales (on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Allen D. Adams, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Number 4 slide is defective
customer_reviews.text: I will have to ship it back and order again. The number 4 slide mount is defective and will not slide in all the way on the laser. The other 1, 2 and 3 slide mounts fit perfectly on the laser with no force, they just slide into place. The number 4 slide which I need for my Walther PPQ slide in about 3/4 of the way but not all the way, so it is impossible to mount on my rail. Also the two swab sticks to clean the lens were not in the package. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Gall Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good, bright laser but...
customer_reviews.text: After two years and around 2000 rds it loses zero every few shots. I noticed it was getting loose so I went to tighten it and the plastic broke. I'm ordering another due to having a desantis iwb made for this setup. This time I'm getting a torque driver to be sure I don't over do it. Metal mounting bracket would be nice. Regardless, this is the last one I'm buying unless they strengthen the mounts. Glock 19. I wouldn't even consider using this on .40 or larger, it won't last.
customer_reviews.author: The grey bush

customer_reviews.title: very bright green laser , makes pistol easy to aim
customer_reviews.text: weak mounting system, loses zero easily after only 10 shots . Crimson Trace needs to develop a stronger mount system.
customer_reviews.author: West coast man

customer_reviews.title: Great until it broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Installed this on a Beretta PX4 compact .40. Green laser was strong int he daylight. Looked great. However, halfway through shooting at the range, I noticed it laying down on the ground. Having taken care not to overtighten it, and the .40 being hot, snappy round, I'd thought it had just gotten loose and fell off. So I just tossed it into my range bag. Then when I got home and took a closer look, I noticed that the lip of the left plastic clamp that affixes to the pistol rail had cracked, making it unmountable. Not good after barely one day of use. I've contacted for a refund/assistance and we'll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great laser sight
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Crimson Trace rail master laser sight I own. One projects a red dot, the other projects a green dot. Both rail master models are OUTSTANDING ! They exceed expectations in all areas. *For my eyes, the green laser is easier to see that the red laser; especially outdoors in the sunshine. The green laser dot will show up clearly on target at 25 yards. However, for the red dot, I have to look much more closely at 25 yards. In low light, or twilight, both laser sights work equally well. This is a Great laser sight: Very High Quality. --- Recommended., DW
customer_reviews.author: David M. Wicka

customer_reviews.title: Crimson Trace CMR-206 Rail Master Universal Green Laser Sight
customer_reviews.text: This laser sight is a perfect fit for a Smith & Wesson .380 Shield EZ. Installation and setup took about 10 minutes. Calibration was simplified by using a boresighter and lining up the boresight and Crimson trace lasers on a target 50 feet away. Only problem is finding a holster that accommodates the CMR-206. All the holsters I've found work with the S&W 9mm and 40mm pistols, which are almost an inch shorter than the .380. I'm still looking for a .380 holster that will accept the CMR-206. That's not a fault of Crimson Trace.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Bull

customer_reviews.title: Viridian bite me! CRIMSON TRACE BABY!
customer_reviews.text: Great Green Laser Beams Bat Man! This little laser is fantastic. Visible in any light. 25yards in broad dailight! Super simple to zero, it's a joy to use. All this at less than 1/2 the cost of a similar Viridian. Who's your Daddy!
customer_reviews.author: Mr XTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laser!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect laser! The green laser is visible in bright light. This Crimson Trace laser is perfect for railed guns. It fits both of my PPQs perfectly. It is easy to use and you have the power to turn it on only when you want it on. The switch is in a natural position where your finger is placed before you're ready to shoot. Just push the button and it's on. I liked it so well that I bought a second one for my other PPQ (9mm and .45). You can't go wrong with this compact, powerful, durable laser.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Creager

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Crimson Trace. Purchased it for my Glock 19. Easy to install and adjust (if needed). With the current sale price it was $50 less than my first Crimson Trace. What a deal and what a great laser!
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: when you get a trace product, you are getting you money’s worth.
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact design and convenient on/off actuator and the green laser is on the spot. This was the second one I've had. I had to replace it because the battery was dead. I called amazon, got the box in ups that day, the day before yesterday and the new on was delivered today.I have crimson trace lasers on all my hand guns and the new link bluetooth one they make for the AR15!
customer_reviews.author: Low Crawl

customer_reviews.title: Dead On
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Kel Tech Sub 2000 Gen 2. It is super easy to install, like 3 minutes. I took it to the range and within 10 min. it was dialed in. It is well made, sturdy, easy to adjust for elevation and windage. It holds accuracy after 100's of rounds. The On/Off switch is very easy to use on any gun. Over All, you get what you pay for, and this laser is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: RMan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago, I purchased a cheap, universal, laser sight, but wasn't happy with it. I decided to spend the extra money and get a Crimson Trace, which seems to be the industry leader. I wish I had gotten it the first time, as the laser is much more powerful, than the cheap one, and the mount is rock solid. When your life may depend on something, don't buy cheap!
customer_reviews.author: R. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very clean installed on my PPQ almost like it is a factory option. I noticed another reviewer stated he used insert #4 on his PPQ and that is what the manual recommends. I used #3 because I liked that it put the paddle switch edges right inline with the trigger guard. Great product, I am still waiting to see how the battery life plays out. The laser is very bright and has a well defined circle, the paddle switches have a very crisp click to activate the laser.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and looks goos
customer_reviews.text: I ended up rigging this to my P320 Carry. It was not an exact fit but I was able to make it work since I have a bigger hand. I'm still able to reach the on off switch. I just wish I did not have to sight it in as much. Once you put a few hundred rounds it tends to drift off target but that's no big deal to get it back insight. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Blue

customer_reviews.title: Mounting screws
customer_reviews.text: Integral nut for the mounting screw has come out and will not except the screw when put back into the unit. while out of the unit screw will thread perfectly fine, but now cannot be trusted to stay sighted in nor secure on firearm. these nuts should be NON REMOVABLE but they are not. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this order
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this order. Actually, ordered a 2nd one after the price dropped but I noticed it has gone up again. It's still lower priced with this seller then any where on_line. You may have to do a bit of tweaking @ the range to make it spot on but it's not that difficult. Easy assembly and green lasers are much easier to see then the red.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: laser is excellent. mount, not so much
customer_reviews.text: spend over a hundred dollars on a laser sight and you’d think the mount would be more than just cheap plastic that sheers off just from resting in a gun cabinet. i have to rethink whether i’m going to trust my life to a sight that may fall off without warning.
customer_reviews.author: df

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Mount is garbage - used one time and didn't have tight enough to keep on rail - tightened 1/2 turn and mount cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Natmun

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easy to use, very accurate, stays zeroed in
customer_reviews.text: Great laser. I've had it on 4 different pistols and it's been awesome on all of them. Super bright, much better than the red one that I also own. Easy to sight in, stays sighted in, very accurate. Works great in the dark or light. Highly recommend to anyone as a training aid or for night use. Works well with my truglo and Trijicon night sights for better night time target acquisition
customer_reviews.author: Chris perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice Laser for S&W 380 EZ Pistol
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a S&W 380 EZ pistol. The fitment was great and easy to install on the pistol's rail. I didn't realize until recently this particular model was an option as opposed to the other more expensive model that fits this pistol. This model is half the price. The only thing now is to find a holster that's compatible with this model.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Green all the way to Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: I can see this laser in full FLA sunshine. I am ecstatic! Finally a truly useable laser both day and night. Speaking of night, this thing shines off into the heavens and doubles as a tac-light it's so powerful. Mounting was easy and it comes with adapters to fit most any small to medium size frame. Looks great on my Ruger SR22. Glad I finally gave in and spent a bit more. Sometimes you really do get what you pay for and I have learned the hard way here. Don't be cheap when it comes to these laser sights and go green! Red ones are useless rubbish....
customer_reviews.author: JeepGuyFL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a little tricky to install at first
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be intimidated by the installation comment - if I had another to install, it would take less than half the time this one did. Fantastic laser sight, high quality manufacture. Also have a red CT sight which is equally good but the green is so remarkably brighter in daylight. Easy activation by index finger reaching just beyond the trigger guard. Unfortunately I can no longer use my factory Beretta leather holster so now to find a holster that accommodates both gun and laser.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best laser for the Shockwave
customer_reviews.text: Love the low profile look it gives to my Mossberg Shockwave. Bright laser projects a tight beam of green light. Also mounted an offset tactical light. It works great as laser projects thru the offset without disturbing the laser dot. Since it's a hand held shotgun it really can't be aimed so the laser makes perfect sense.
customer_reviews.author: spiderfromearth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Glock 19 gen 4
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Glock 19 gen4 home defense pistol. The installation was a breeze and only made minor elevation adjustment at the range. It shot nicely and stay true after numerous rounds. The green laser was very visible during day light too. The weight is negligible and doesn't affect handling and function of the pistol
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. Its Nice and easy to attach to a glock 17 gen 5. Easy to zero in and stays put. Batteries for life and a 3 year warranty. It is small and really a great product. I was hesitant to spend the extra coin, but now am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: ShpwrckTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great product bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Item is fine, thank God it didn't arrive broken, it was loose in the package. Easy to set up however don't work with my ruger mark 4 tactical. 22/45. I would recommend this product, however its a roll of the dice, if you receive it undamaged
customer_reviews.author: michael mattina

customer_reviews.title: Nice laser sight, nice price! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install on S&W 9c. Seems like a quality build and easy to operate. I've included some photos but as the others reviews have stated its much brighter in person, it's really bright. Outside on partly sunny day and aiming at a tree about 50 ft away I could see the light. Looking down the factory sights it appears to be at least close to zero'd. I plan on getting to the range later this week, once I do I'll update the review. But so far I'm very happy with it. Bought through Amazon third party ABCD sales, cheapest price and free shipping. It arrive 2 days before the estimated date.
customer_reviews.author: Cord cutter

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I wear a universal cumber-bun hip holster. It was getting caught in the stitching a bit, so I trimmed it. Now it works great, easy draw. I was worried that my holster would trigger it to go off when I sat down or drove with it. Not the case. I have had it on my hip and my back, no issues at all. Easy to install, easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laser!
customer_reviews.text: Great laser. Had an issue at the beginning but customer support quickly fixed the problem. The laser is awesome. Easily viable and holds zero which is most important. Nice and compact so it’s perfect for ccw. 5 stars all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Leyva

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! Direct hit every time after initial adjusting
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Direct hit every time after initial adjusting. Hasn't gone out of adjustment after 100 rounds, haven't shot more than that since I got it. Fits on my gun like it was made for it, the paddle buttons are just the right length to be pressed by an extended finger. And the paddles are curved slightly inwards so they are less likely to catch on anything.
customer_reviews.author: dosboss

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's Crimson Trace.....what do you expect. I installed it on my Ruger SR22 and getting 0.375 inch groups at 10 yards with CCI 40 gr.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this thing & the price was amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing & the price was amazing. Fits my Springfield XD Mod 2 .45 perfectly. Performs as advertised. Green laser is highly visible in the day. Turn it on at night and it will go about as far as you can see. It is pretty incredible. I was able to register the warranty with CT & received free lifetime batteries through some promotion they were running. Performed well at the range with minimum sighting. A+ so far from my point of view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: Great similitude even in sunshine. Love it. So much better than red laser
customer_reviews.author: insomar

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and great price !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and look forward to using it on the range. Not having massive hands my index finger can still easily reach the on/off switch. I put this on a Taurus G2C. I bought in inexpensive holster until I find that "perfect" one and after a slight molding of holster the sight doesn't cause sticking when removing.
customer_reviews.author: EdGOhio

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The rail suddenly broke while I was at the range. I seems I may have jump through hoops to get this replace I guess. We will see. I will update in the next day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Green laser provides great visibility, and registration with Crimson Trace gives you lifetime batteries! Can be used on my Sig P250c and AR-15. I don't know why I waited so long to pick one of these up...fast target acquisition makes this a must-have. And the price through Amazon was half of the retail price on the manufacturer's site!
customer_reviews.author: Roxtar69

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best add on laser for its value by far!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing just installed it on my glock 21sf gen 3,you could easily take it on and off anytime yourself,works with all glocks and doesn’t require a piccatiny rail,it’s much better than lasermax which blinks instead of having a constant beam plus it might counterbalance recoil just a little but haven’t tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing laser I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing laser I have ever purchased. It is tiny but incredibly bright. I have the green visible units and the IR invisible units for Night Vision rifles. I am sighting these in on rifles for wild hog hunting and they are holding zero. I expect quality from Crimson Trace but just not in this small of a unit. If we are dropping wild hogs at 250-yards you know it will stay sighted in on your pistol.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive sight!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the sight from abcd sales on 9/24 (Saturday) and received it on 9/26. It took a whopping 30 seconds to install including a 20 second walk to get the screwdriver :) The device itself is very small, fits perfectly and does not affect any of the operations. Ambidextrous on/off switch. Green laser easily seen in daylight. I was switching it between 3 different pistols and it performed admirably on all 3 (22, 9 and a 45). After about 100 rounds with 1911 45 the sight was exactly as if I just put it on.
customer_reviews.author: NYRangersFan

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, very light
customer_reviews.text: Its bright enough to see in daylight and very light. I had to trim a couple of corners to fit my px4 compact but only slivers. I can't mount a micro red dot or I would have since I can't see irons anymore. This is at least the next best thing and cheaper to boot.
customer_reviews.author: P. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Superb!! and free replacement batteries for life.
customer_reviews.text: This excellent product fits perfectly on my Glock 19 and is an excellent daytime laser. When I registered my laser on the Crimson Trace web site, I noticed that this model qualifies for FREE batteries for life. This is quite a perk since the battery is a strange bundle of button cells.
customer_reviews.author: Harv

customer_reviews.title: Why not buy the best... Crimson Trace!
customer_reviews.text: I am most proud of having this device. It arrived on time and, considering the quality, at a fair price. I first used a bore sight to true the device, but found it off an inch when in actual use. I readjusted the green dot on the firing line and found I had more than enough accuracy for even the long distance shots.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred B. Jernigan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Laser arrived a little late, probably due to the big freeze in the eastern US. Looks good and fits my H&K P30SK with insert 1. Good luck finding a holster to fit but I digress...Original Crimson Trace green laser so it should be functional and reliable. We'll see
customer_reviews.author: CDMiller

customer_reviews.title: Great for older eyes as well as home defense use
customer_reviews.text: When it gets difficult to see the front sight and the target clearly, this will get your groups back the way they used to be. For a defensive weapon, you can hit your target when your posture is compromised or you are not prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Green Laser
customer_reviews.text: The vendor shipped this unit ULTRA fast!! I got it in two days!! Very competitively priced as well. CT makes good stuff and this mini rail mounted laser is no exception. Mounting to gun is simple and laser set up is easy. Great product, great service, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Luis J Abellon

customer_reviews.title: I think lasers are more effective than tritium sights in ...
customer_reviews.text: I think lasers are more effective than tritium sights in a dark situation. My green laser lights up a target at night, making it possible to identify whether it should be a target. If you have a rail this laser should fit. You could mount it on a top rail, but your sight adjustment will be opposite that of the included instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzer

customer_reviews.title: Bright Green At A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little laser that should now on most any pistol with the rail. I put this on mine and it looks great! This is a very little laser however it is a very bright little laser. You can see this thing day/night or whenever. definitely a great addition if your gun owner.
customer_reviews.author: Private User

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I can see the green laser outside in the daylight out to 25 yards. Great brand at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: ja1958

customer_reviews.title: Made the right choice with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I went with the green dot, very bright in the daylight and at night just amazing, had this mounted in just a few minutes and adjusted to my metal sights was a snap. Haven't been to the range yet but adjusting it to you metal sights should put it real close to target until I can pop some holes in paper. Spend a little more for this green dot and you be glad you didn't go with the cheaper red dot units.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laser. Does not work great in broad daylight ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laser. Does not work great in broad daylight for target practice. Holsters no longer fit with this attached below the barrel. A little pricey. But, great in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: mojoman

customer_reviews.title: Great laser site to have.
customer_reviews.text: A Crimson Trace is a Crimson Trace is a Crimson Trace. High priced but WORKS extremely well. And free batteries for life. Sometimes you just get what you pay for. This is my 5th Trace over ten years and all are still performing as new. If you can afford it, go Green. It really does work better in daylight situations.
customer_reviews.author: J. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Install easily and very secure
customer_reviews.text: I put the CMR-206 on a Springfield XD-9mm pistol. Install easily and very secure. The laser adjustments are easily done. The green laser is visible at the range in full daylight. Excellent purchase at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Laycock

customer_reviews.text: HAD TO RETURN IT. LASTED THROUGH 2-3 MAGAZINES BEFORE FLYING OFF OF THE RAIL. PUT IT BACK ON WITH BLUE LOC-TITE AND THIS TIME LASTED ABOUT TWENTY MINUTES. UNABLE TO EFFECTIVELY TIGHTEN IT ON RAIL (OF GLOCK 30s).
customer_reviews.author: TonyMuff

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted perfectly to my XDs 45. Easy to sight in and very accurate. Concealed carry daily with over 300 rounds through the pistol since installation with no loss of accuracy. Very bright laser even in bright sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey G

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Went on recommendation from a friend and ad in Guns&Ammo mag. Glad I bought it- fit great on Glock 19. Will probably buy another for my Sig P320. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little laser. Works well with my Sig 226 in 40 S&W. No drift detected under fire. On/Off switch is positive. Has three modes of operation. 1) on continous, 2) pulse, 3) momentary. Well worth the extra for the green version.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepdog81

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easy to mount, nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have this mounted on the business end of an AR15 on a rail. It’s diminutive and awesome, plain and simple. I wish they would make it out of aluminum instead of plastic, but that’s the only reason I hold back a star.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaMan

customer_reviews.title: expensive laser. Good battery housing. One issue.
customer_reviews.text: It’s got a very nice battery housing. The issue is windage and elevation affect each other when zeroing in. Tricky to adjust perfectly because when you move one, the other moves, example, turn the windage beam left, it goes left but up goes the elevation as well. Unless you turn them just right. It’s tricky to explain. But it’s definitely a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: As with all my Crimson Trace products, works as ...
customer_reviews.text: As with all my Crimson Trace products, works as it's supposed to. Have it on a KSG and after over 100 high powered slugs through it, it's still right on.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: great lazer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I mounted a Crimson Trace CMR-206 on my new ruger security 9 about 6 months ago. Have shot around 3,000 rnds with it & the thing has stayed zero ed perfectly. it doesn't show up that great in direct sun light. about 50ft. is it. but its been trouble free. keep some swabs handi, to wipe off the lazer eye which gets dirty from the blast at the end of the barrel. I was careful not to over tighten anything at install, and cked after shooting with it the first few times and just snugged up mounting screws a little and since then haven't done a thing to it.
customer_reviews.author: TAE

customer_reviews.title: Great laser for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, great quality. Took it to the range couple of times and after 400 rounds, still in place and accurate. Green is much better than red, very easy to see in day light or night. Still have to wait to see how it does with battery ,etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic mounts break every easy.
customer_reviews.text: I also had a bad experience with this cheap plastic mount breaking on me. Except I never made it to the range to sight it in... very disappointing. I hope crm warranties this or I will be very upset. Even tried to super glue it, I wanted to hit the range so bad....
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: CMR-206 Fits nicely on Springfield XDE
customer_reviews.text: This laser from Crimson Trace CMR-206 fits perfectly on my Springfield XDE 3.3” 9mm. I had to make a small adjustment on windage and elevation put that process is quite easy. The green laser is bright and the unit looks like it belongs on the XDE. Very happy with the product. Crimson Trace makes quality products. Next stop will be taking it to the range to try it out. Expecting good results.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Warranty seems to be a lie until resolved
customer_reviews.text: I love the green lazer I have never dropped or hit it on anything but when I turn it on it will turn on and then turn off and I have a one year warranty on it and now its saying you cant return it or get it replaced I am highly upset with that because first of all stick to your word but I will love if yall can just replace the product because from what I see is that it is like to self destruct
customer_reviews.author: Alem mrkaljevic

customer_reviews.title: Love the green
customer_reviews.text: Seems expensive, but was easy to put on. Wish my other would mount this laser, would like a combining led light. Right or Left activation is nice so is it’s size.
customer_reviews.author: Over-Spender

customer_reviews.title: No dust-scatter affect around the dot like you see with the cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't necessary but purchased for effect. Mounted to a CQB paper punch. This thin is crisp and bright. In the dark you can see the beam as it projects. No dust-scatter affect around the dot like you see with the cheap stuff. I parallel zeroed this with the bore and is mounted below on a free float. The only con is that the tail end of this, right above the switch, mimics the switch in its shape and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer #1

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: just got it today and it fit snug as a bug on my AR-15, I went to sight it up and it was dead on. Great green laser. I am very happy with it, easy to install as well, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect green laser with strobe
customer_reviews.text: green laser with strobe at its best on various pistols for CQB. Green laser is brighter and the strobe makes it even easier to muzzle target(s). Plus Crimson Trace will send free battery once a year forever...
customer_reviews.author: Tri M. Bui

customer_reviews.title: Nice low light
customer_reviews.text: Great for low light target acquisition. Mount easy and zeros easily. Registered so I now get 1 battery set per year FREE!
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: What! No screws... now I’m screwed.
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the 2 screws for mounting the laser. I can tried for three weeks to get a response from Crimson Trace. Just crickets thus far.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to attach to a Jericho 9mm with easy-to-follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach to a Jericho 9mm with easy-to-follow instructions. A slight windage adjustment out the box and it's been dead-on for 400 rounds so far. Don't think I'll use it much for daytime shoots, even though the "green dot" is clearly visible, but in low light, it's a game changer. Had a little difficulty finding a compatible holster to fit the Jericho with laser attached, but that's as much the fault of the weapon, as the laser. IWI are very low on accessories compared to Glock etc. Overall, very happy and glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Graham B.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, very easy to zero in using a small vice while the pistol is pointed fairly close to a target. Very bright. I’d def get another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: old mojo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. The button for turn on/off is big enough that won't be miss.
customer_reviews.author: minni

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Bright enough. Set up wasn't too bad. I also bought a laser bore sight tool, which made this easy to align with the provided allen key. This is on my carry gun in a pocket holster I cut to fit (desantis superfly). I have not noticed the laser being turned on accidentally, the paddles require a stiff press.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate, easy to see..
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily, easy to sight in if you have a bore sight. Easy to operate and target acquisition is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseguy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on a rifle. When it's too dark for a scope but you can still see the target with the naked eye, this bright, tight focus laser keeps you right on target. Great for hog hunting ! The extra bennie is that CT will replace the battery for free(you get one per year). I couldn't find or think of a fault with this product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: OldOwl

product_meta.title: Crimson Trace CMR-206 Rail Master Universal Laser with Instant Activation and Quick Installation for Pic Rail Mounts, Shooting, Competition and Range
product_meta.description: The CMR-206 Rail Master is compact, yet powerful, universal green laser sight designed to fit rail-equipped pistols, rifles and shotguns. The laser sight fits onto virtually any firearm with a modern (M1913 Picatinny or Weaver-style) accessory rail. Ambidextrous control tabs allow the user to instantly activate or deactivate the laser.
feature_bullets: BRIGHTNESS: Features a 5mW peak, 515-532nm, Class 3R visible green laser that is in conformance with and complies with 21 CFR 1040.10 with a max power output of 5mW for a Class 3R Green Laser - the brightest beam allowed by law
RUNTIME: 2 hours of battery life that runs on (1) 1/3N battery (included)

EASE OF USE: Ambidextrous Tap-On / Tap-Off Controls for immediate laser activation from either side of the unit - user installed - no gunsmithing required (four fit inserts are included for specific firearm fit)
VERSATILITY: Can be used on most pistols, rifles, and shotguns with M1913 Picatinny or similar accessory rail & 1-1/16" between the recoil lug and the trigger guard
RELIABLE: Factory sighted at 50 feet, but is fully user adjustable for Windage and Elevation with provided tool
GUARANTEED: This product is covered by a 1-Year Limited Warranty. For questions or warranty contact us at support@crimsontrace.com

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
